# Introduction

In this project, I will be posting different data visualization submitting in the Tidytuesday project maintained by the R Learning Community.

** Source of data used

On every Tuesday a data challenge is submitted to the R for data science [github repo](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) project maintained by the R Learning and users community. 
This is an active community from which newbies to R learn from others' work on weekly basis. 

** Who contribute to this project

Everyone with interest to share his/her work with other mates for sake for sake of improving knowledge in using for `data analysis` and `data science`.
